name: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Dice onion; mince garlic. Bring a 4 qt pot of salted water to a rolling boil.
Heat oil in a deep skillet (med-high). Sweat onion 3 min; add garlic 30 sec.
Add mince; cook 5 min, breaking up until browned.
Clear a hot spot, toast tomato purée 60 sec. Stir in tomatoes, oregano & 60 ml water; scrape fond. Simmer gently 15 min.
Boil spaghetti 8–9 min to al dente; reserve 60 ml cooking water, drain.
Season sauce, loosen with reserved water as needed, toss in pasta 1 min until glossy. Serve hot.

name: Chicken Tacos
steps: Toss chicken with seasoning & oil; stand 5 min.
Cook in hot skillet 3 min / side to 165 °F. Rest 2 min, slice.
Warm tortillas 15 sec / side in same pan; keep under a towel.
Fill each tortilla with chicken, lettuce, cheddar & salsa. Fold and serve immediately.

name: Oven-Baked Mac & Cheese
steps: Cook macaroni 7 min; drain.
Melt butter, whisk in flour 1 min until nutty.
Whisk in milk gradually; simmer 4 min to nappe thickness.
Off heat, melt in 60 g cheddar; season.
Fold pasta into sauce; pour into buttered 20 cm dish.
Mix remaining cheddar with crumbs, scatter. Bake 15 min @ 200 °C/400 °F until bubbling & golden. Rest 5 min before serving.

name: Roast Chicken Leg & Veg
steps: Pat dry; rub with ½ Tbsp oil, herbs, salt & pepper.
Toss veg with remaining oil, salt & pepper; spread on small roasting pan.
Set chicken on veg; bake 70–80 min @ 190 °C/375 °F until thickest joint hits 165 °F, turning veg once.
Rest 10 min; carve leg and plate with roast vegetables.

name: Chili con Carne
steps: Heat oil in Dutch oven; sear beef 4 min.
Add onion 3 min, then garlic 30 sec.
Stir in chili powder 30 sec.
Add tomatoes, beans, 120 ml water, salt & pepper; simmer 20 min, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, cook rice per pack (≈ 12 min), drain.
Spoon rice into a deep bowl and ladle chili over top. Optional garnish: cilantro, cheese, or yogurt.

name: Beef Meatballs in Tomato Sauce
steps: Combine beef, breadcrumbs, beaten egg, garlic, ¼ tsp salt & pepper; roll 4–5 meatballs.
Heat oil in deep pan; sear meatballs 2 min per side.
Pour in passata + 60 ml water, scrape fond, cover, simmer 15 min.
Meanwhile boil spaghetti 8 min al dente; drain, saving a splash.
Loosen sauce with pasta water if thick; plate pasta, spoon over meatballs & sauce.

name: Vegetable Chickpea Curry
steps: Simmer rice in 150 ml water 12 min; cover & rest.
Heat oil in saucepan; fry curry paste 30 sec aromatic.
Stir in vegetables 2 min, then chickpeas 1 min.
Add coconut milk + 60 ml water; simmer gently 10 min until veg tender. Season.
Mound rice in a bowl, ladle curry over, and enjoy.

name: Turkey Meatloaf & Roast Potatoes
steps: Combine turkey, crumbs, egg, ¼ tsp salt & pepper; shape into a 4 × 2 in log on foil-lined tray. Brush top with half the ketchup.
Toss spuds with oil, salt; spread beside loaf.
Bake 45 min @ 180 °C / 350 °F, turning potatoes once. Brush remaining ketchup on loaf the last 5 min.
Let loaf sit 5 min; slice and plate with crispy roast potatoes.

name: Slow-Cooker Pulled-Pork Sandwich
steps: Place pork + 40 g BBQ sauce in slow-cooker; cover and cook LOW 8 h (or HIGH 4 h) until fork-tender.
Transfer meat to board; pull apart with forks, discarding excess fat. Return to cooker, stir into juices.
Optional: 1 min cut-side in dry pan for texture.
Pile 120 g sauced pork onto bun base, top with ready coleslaw, drizzle remaining BBQ sauce, cap and serve warm.

name: BBQ Chicken Drumsticks & Corn
steps: Pat the drumsticks dry; season all over with salt and pepper.
Brush each drumstick with a thin coat of BBQ sauce, getting under the skin where possible. Let stand 5 min while the oven pre-heats.
Place drumsticks on a foil-lined tray. Roast at 200 °C / 400 °F for 20 min.
Remove, baste with another light layer of sauce, flip, baste the second side, and roast 15 min more until juices run clear (75 °C / 167 °F internal).
During the last 10 min, add the corn (still in its husk) to the oven rack or grill pan; the husk steams the kernels.
Strip the husk, season corn with a pinch of salt, and spoon any tray juices over the chicken before serving.

name: Greek-Style Chicken Gyro
steps: Dice thigh into strips; toss with yogurt, oregano, garlic, lemon, salt, pepper. Rest 10 min (or overnight).
Heat a ridged skillet to medium-high; add marinated chicken and sear 4 min a side until char-marked and 75 °C internal.
Lay the bread directly on the hot pan for 30 sec each side so it becomes pliable.
Spread 1 Tbsp fresh yogurt down the centre; pile on chicken, then tomato-cucumber salad.
Fold the sides over the filling and roll into a tight cone.
Eat immediately, or wrap in parchment for an on-the-go lunch.

name: Veggie Quesadillas
steps: Heat oil in a non-stick pan; add vegetables and cook 2 min to drive off moisture. Season lightly.
On one tortilla sprinkle half the cheese, the hot veg, then the remaining cheese; top with the second tortilla.
Return the stack to the dry skillet over medium heat. Cook 2-3 min until the underside is golden and cheese is melting.
Place a plate over the pan, invert, then slide quesadilla back in to toast the second side 2 min.
Rest 1 min, cut into quarters, serve with salsa or yogurt.

name: Lentil & Carrot Soup + Bread
steps: Warm oil in a saucepan; cook onion 3 min until translucent, then carrots 2 min.
Stir in lentils, pour over hot stock, bring to a gentle boil.
Reduce heat; cover and cook 20 min, stirring occasionally, until lentils break down and soup thickens.
Blend partially with an immersion blender for a creamy body, leaving some carrot pieces. Salt and pepper to taste.
Ladle into a warmed bowl; toast bread 2 min under grill and serve for dunking.

name: Tuna Pasta Bake
steps: Cook penne in salted water 8 min (just shy of al dente); drain, reserving 2 Tbsp cooking water.
In a bowl mix pasta, tuna flakes, corn, and reserved water.
Switch oven to 200 °C / 400 °F. Lightly oil a single-serve baking dish.
In a small pot melt 5 g butter; whisk in 5 g flour 1 min; slowly add 100 ml milk, whisking until smooth and thick (about 2 min). Season with a pinch of salt.
Fold sauce through the pasta mixture; tip into the dish, level, sprinkle Cheddar and a dusting of paprika on top.
Place on a tray and bake 10–12 min until the cheese is bubbling and lightly browned. Rest 3 min before eating.

name: Ham & Cheese Omelette + Side Salad
steps: Beat eggs with a pinch of salt & pepper until frothy.
Pre-heat pan (20 cm non-stick) on medium; melt butter.
Pour & pull in eggs; as curds set, draw edges inward allowing raw egg to flow.
Fill centre with ham & cheddar; cover 30 s to steam-melt.
Fold in half with spatula; slide to warm plate.
Toss leaves with a drizzle of olive oil & squeeze of lemon. Serve immediately.

name: Beef & Vegetable Stew
steps: Brown beef in hot oiled saucepan 4 min; season.
Add onion & carrot 3 min. Dust with flour; cook 1 min.
Deglaze with ¼ cup stock, scraping fond; add remaining stock & potatoes.
Bring to gentle bubble, cover, and cook 90 min on low, stirring twice, until beef is fork-tender. Top up with water if needed.
Adjust seasoning, ladle into a deep bowl.

name: Oven-Baked Fish & Chips
steps: Heat oven to 200 °C / 400 °F.
Toss potato batons with oil & salt; spread on parchment-lined tray. Bake 15 min.
Place fillet beside chips; bake 20 min more, flipping chips once, until fish is crisp and 63 °C internal.
Microwave peas with 1 Tbsp water 90 s; drain.
Plate fish, chips & peas; season with vinegar if desired.

name: Vegetable Bean Tacos
steps: Tip beans & corn into small pan; stir in seasoning, splash 2 Tbsp water, warm 3 min.
Toast tortillas 15 s per side in dry skillet.
Divide hot bean mix between tortillas, top with cheddar; fold and serve.

name: Sheet-Pan Sausage & Veg
steps: Pre-heat oven to 200 °C / 400 °F; line a small sheet pan.
Toss veg with oil, herbs, salt & pepper; scatter on pan.
Slice link into 2 cm pieces; nestle among veg.
Roast 15 min; shake pan, roast 8-10 min more until veg are char-edged and sausage reads 74 °C.
Serve straight from the tray or over quick couscous.
